basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Bilingual, accounting professional with additional expertise in automated systems and general ledger. An analytical, detail-oriented, organized planner who performs well in a project setting and communicates effectively with all levels of management. Additionally has past experience in pubic accounting.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained reconciliation and documentation for damage recovery accounts; communicated with Florida Power & Light (FPL) centers though out the State of Florida to assure appropriate and timely recovery of damage amounts and clearing of service center pending items; researched transactions where discrepancies were located and resolved with the appropriate manager.
highlights: Designed reconciliation format of several tax suspense accounts
Assured that internal controls and procedures were properly implemented and maintained

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Reconciled various general ledger fund accounts and prepared various specialty reports; ascertained accuracy of financial reporting to Board of Directors through review and correction of month end and annual financial reports.
highlights: Brought uniformity of reporting for association of churches by assisting in standardizing chart of accounts

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Recorded a wide variety of transactions; assured accuracy of all transactions posted to bank; researched discrepancies.

volunteer.summary: Brought new life to the church's programs by developing, implementing and establishing a formal structure for the Children's Ministry and Audio-visual Ministry for teens.
highlights: Insured coordination among the different volunteer groups
Built the groundwork for the puppet ministry
